mapper.update: update base_ugroup set ugroupid=ugroupid ,ugroupname=#{ugroupname} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} ,description=#{description} ,ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where ugroupid=#{ugroupid}

update base_ugroup set ugroupid=ugroupid ,ugroupname=#{ugroupname} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} ,description=#{description} ,ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where 1=1 and ugroupid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and ugroupid =#{Where_Id} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and ugroupname=#{Where_ugroupname} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and ugrouptype=#{Where_ugrouptype} and description=#{Where_description} and ugrouplevel=#{Where_ugrouplevel} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.ugroupname "ugroupname", t.parentid "parentid", t.ugrouptype "ugrouptype", t.description "description", t.ugrouplevel "ugrouplevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from base_ugroup t where ugroupid=#{ugroupid}

select t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.ugroupname "ugroupname", t.parentid "parentid", t.ugrouptype "ugrouptype", t.description "description", t.ugrouplevel "ugrouplevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from base_ugroup t where 1=1 and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.ugroupname=#{ugroupname} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} and t.description=#{description} and t.ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.ugroupname "ugroupname", t.parentid "parentid", t.ugrouptype "ugrouptype", t.description "description", t.ugrouplevel "ugrouplevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", p.provincename, c.cityname, ct.countyname, g.groupname, cp.companyname, gd.graindepotname from base_ugroup t left join l_province p on t.provinceid=p.provinceid left join l_city c on t.cityid=c.cityid left join l_county ct on t.countyid=ct.countyid left join l_group g on t.groupid=g.groupid left join l_company cp on t.companyid=cp.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid where 1=1 and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.ugroupname like #{ugroupname} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} and t.description=#{description} and t.ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.delete: delete from base_ugroup where 1=1 and ugroupid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and ugroupid =#{Where_Id} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and ugroupname=#{Where_ugroupname} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and ugrouptype=#{Where_ugrouptype} and description=#{Where_description} and ugrouplevel=#{Where_ugrouplevel} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.ugroupname "ugroupname", t.parentid "parentid", t.ugrouptype "ugrouptype", t.description "description", t.ugrouplevel "ugrouplevel", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from base_ugroup t where 1=1 and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.ugroupname=#{ugroupname} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} and t.description=#{description} and t.ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select count(*) from base_ugroup t where 1=1 and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.ugroupid!=#{NoId} and t.ugroupname=#{ugroupname} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.ugrouptype=#{ugrouptype} and t.description=#{description} and t.ugrouplevel=#{ugrouplevel} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
